sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( MTDG_CORP_CODE ,MTDG_METH_GUBN ,MTDG_COME_CODE ,MTDG_STND_DEGR ,MTDG_REGT_NO ,MTDG_REVI_DATE ,MTDG_APPL_DATE ,MTDG_HKMC_DEGR ,MTDG_DEGR_CONT ,MTDG_STND_FILE ,MTDG_STND_MAN1 ,MTDG_PHON_NO1 ,MTDG_STND_MAN2 ,MTDG_PHON_NO2 ,MTDG_MENU_ID ,MTDG_MXML_PATH ,MTDG_ATT_GRP_CD ,MTDG_APPL_YN ,MTDG_UPDT_DATE ,MTDG_UPDT_CMAN ,MTDG_INIT_DATE ,MTDG_INIT_CMAN ,MTDG_TRAN_DEGR ,MTDG_MCHH_DATE ,MTDG_MODL_NAME ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'A', 'BRAZ', '16-1', NULL, '20140101', '20150901', NULL, '전력소비율 개정', NULL, '소순철', '5297', '한창선', NULL, 'PCF20020', 'ui/bp/tcams/ca/braz/em-cabraz-p17c.html', '13312', 'N', '20151207', 'ADMIN', '20151207', 'ADMIN', NULL, NULL, NULL FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'A', 'BRAZ', '17', NULL, '20171201', '20171201', '17', '원가계산기준 일원화', NULL, '우한섭', '5295', '한창선', '5272', 'PCF30160', 'ui/bp/tcams/ca/braz/em-cabraz-p17c.html', '13613', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '1', '20171201', 'CASPBRAZ_P17_3' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'A', 'BRAZ', '17-3', NULL, '20191201', '20191201', '17-3', 'LNG단가변경외', NULL, '나종훈', '5393', '한창선', '5272', 'PCF30160', 'ui/bp/tcams/ca/braz/em-cabraz-p17c.html', '13613', 'Y', '20191217', 'SYSTEM', '20191217', 'SYSTEM', '2', '20191201', 'CASPBRAZ_P17_3' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'A', 'BRAZ', '18-1', NULL, '20221102', '20221102', '18-1', '개정 2022', NULL, '나종훈', '5393', '한창선', '5272', 'PCF30160', 'ui/bp/tcams/ca/braz/em-cabraz-p18a.html', '13613', 'Y', '20220701', 'SYSTEMPG', '20220629', 'SYSTEMPG', '3', '20221102', 'CASPBRAZ_P18_1' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'A', 'BRAZ', '18-3', NULL, '20231001', '20231001', '18-3', NULL, NULL, '손한민', '5393', '한창선', '5272', 'PCF30160', 'ui/bp/tcams/ca/braz/em-cabraz-p18a.html', NULL, 'Y', '20230930', 'ADMIN', '20230930', 'ADMIN', '4', '20231002', 'CASPBRAZ_P18_3' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'A', 'BRAZ', '18-5', NULL, '20240215', '20240215', '18-5', '전력단가 변경/LPG GAS단가 변경', NULL, '안정환', '5374', '오원규', '5272', 'PCF30160', 'ui/bp/tcams/ca/braz/em-cabraz-p18a.html', NULL, 'Y', '20240215', 'ADMIN', '20240215', 'ADMIN', '5', '20240215', 'CASPBRAZ_P18_5' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.MTDG_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN A.MTDG_UPDT_DATE > B.MTDG_UPDT_DATE THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN B.MTDG_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.MTDG_UPDT_DATE > B.MTDG_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBMTDG B ON B.MTDG_CORP_CODE = A.MTDG_CORP_CODE AND B.MTDG_METH_GUBN = A.MTDG_METH_GUBN AND B.MTDG_COME_CODE = A.MTDG_COME_CODE AND B.MTDG_STND_DEGR = A.MTDG_STND_DEGR ORDER BY MTDG_APPL_DATE
